text: World Gone Crazy is the 13th studio album by the American rock band The Doobie Brothers.'Doobie Brothers Special Issue', Billboard, Vol 122, No. 34 (August 28, 2010), p. 10 The album was released on September 28, 2010. World Gone Crazy debuted at number 39 on the Billboard top 200 albums chart. It was the group's first studio album of new material in 30 years. They worked with the producer of their first 10 albums, Ted Templeman. == References == Category:2010 albums
title: World Gone Crazy
